facts: Matea loves Morgan more than anything in the whole world <3
Morgan is the most perfect guy ever to exist <3
Matea wants to be with Morgan forever <3
Matea is the luckiest girl in the world <3
Morgan makes Matea so incredibly happy <3
Morgan is so special to Matea <3

usage.img_to_colour: Run `{0}img_to_colour` with your desired image as an attachment.
usage.plot:
Run `{0}plot` to plot a mathematical expression.
 **Flags:**
`-range`: Defaults to [-10,10]. Specify a range for your variables. 
	Example: `{0}plot x^2+y -range x=[-5,5] y=[-2.5,2.5]`
`-rt`: Defaults to false. Set the surface plot to rotate. 
`-polar` Defaults to false. Plots the graph in polar coordinates. Use theta instead of x. Default range is [0,2*pi]

brief.img_to_colour: Generates a colour palette from an image.
